verses.verse: וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u So they brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיַּצִּ֣יגוּ <WH3322> vai-yatz-Tzi-gu and set אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch it in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel, of the tent אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָֽטָה־ <WH5186> na-tah- had pitched ל֖וֹ lo דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> da-Vid; that David וַיַּקְרִ֛יבוּ <WH7126> vai-yak-Ri-vu for it and they offered עֹל֥וֹת <WH5930> o-Lot burnt sacrifices וּשְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> u-she-la-Mim and peace offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. God

וַיְכַ֣ל <WH3615> vay-Chal had made an end דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, And when David מֵהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> me-ha-'a-Lot of offering הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah the burnt offerings וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> ve-hash-she-la-Mim; and the peace offerings וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech he blessed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> be-Shem in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְחַלֵּק֙ <WH2505> vay-chal-Lek And he dealt לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to everyone אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish to every one יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> me-'Ish both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah; and woman לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> le-'Ish to every one כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> kik-kar- a loaf לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, of bread וְאֶשְׁפָּ֖ר <WH829> ve-'esh-Par and a good piece of flesh וַאֲשִׁישָֽׁה׃ <WH809> va-'a-shi-Shah. and a flagon

וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten And he appointed לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim [certain] of the Levites מְשָׁרְתִ֑ים <WH8334> me-sha-re-Tim; to minister וּלְהַזְכִּיר֙ <WH2142> u-le-haz-Kir and to record וּלְהוֹד֣וֹת <WH3034> u-le-ho-Dot and to thank וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <WH1984> u-le-hal-Lel, and praise לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

אָסָ֥ף <WH623> 'a-Saf Asaph הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh the chief וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <WH4932> u-mish-Ne-hu and next זְכַרְיָ֑ה <WH2148> ze-char-Yah; to him Zechariah יְעִיאֵ֡ל <WH3273> ye-'i-'El Jeiel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֡וֹת <WH8070> u-she-mi-ra-Mot and Shemiramoth וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <WH3171> vi-chi-'El and Jehiel וּמַתִּתְיָ֡ה <WH4993> u-mat-tit-Yah and Mattithiah וֶאֱלִיאָ֡ב <WH446> ve-'e-li-'Av and Eliab וּבְנָיָהוּ֩ <WH1141> u-ve-na-ya-Hu and Benaiah וְעֹבֵ֨ד ve-'o-Ved אֱדֹ֜ם <WH5654> 'e-Dom and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֗ל <WH3273> vi-'i-'El, and Jeiel בִּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> bich-Lei instruments נְבָלִים֙ <WH5035> ne-va-Lim harps וּבְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <WH3658> u-ve-chin-no-Rot, and with harps וְאָסָ֖ף <WH623> ve-'a-Saf but Asaph בַּֽמְצִלְתַּ֥יִם <WH4700> bam-tzil-Ta-yim with cymbals מַשְׁמִֽיעַ׃ <WH8085> mash-Mi-a'. made a sound

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <WH1141> u-ve-na-Ya-hu Benaiah וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֖ל <WH3166> ve-ya-cha-zi-'El also and Jahaziel הַכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim; the priests בַּחֲצֹצְר֣וֹת <WH2689> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot with trumpets תָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> ta-Mid, continually לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> be-rit- of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

הִֽתְהַֽלְלוּ֙ <WH1984> hit-hal-Lu Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> be-Shem name קָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho, ye in his holy יִשְׂמַ֕ח <WH8055> yis-Mach of them rejoice לֵ֖ב <WH3820> lev let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> me-vak-Shei that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD
